name: Hilarious Election President Run 2016 - With Donald Trump Free
name_original: Hilarious Election President Run 2016 - With Donald Trump Free
description:
It's the time we all been waiting for! The stage is set and candidates are ready to run for the president office! Flap across the beautiful landscape, collect sandwiches, buy sandwiches - the sky is the limit in this endless campaign adventure!

flap, jump, flap and flap across the mexico walls, through the cities and near desert!

Follow us on Facebook for updates / suggestions / feedback! -
https://www.facebook.com/theholycowstudio

Features:

- Comfortable one tap controls

- Game Center, compete with your friends!

- Pick up sandwiches as you progress

- Use sandwiches to unlock more candidates and levels

- Multiple Characters

- Multiple Levels

- Endless play!

We hope you will enjoy this election campaign!

DISCLAIMER: Reference to any celebrity, artist, musician, person, product, name, trademark, service mark, or company name is for descriptive purposes only and does not constitute or imply sponsorship, endorsement, or recommendation unless explicitly stated herein.

For humor purposes only. Not to be taken seriously.
